name: 60FPS player mode
description: Alt+Click the green flag to toggle 60FPS.

name: Project screen reader support
description: Adds limited support for screen readers to the Scratch player. It currently supports say and think bubbles. Functionality that allows projects to explicitly share labels and roles is still being tested.

name: Fix capitalization of Account Settings
description: Changes "Account settings" in the account menu to "Account Settings".

name: Thumbnails setter
description: Adds a button to the editor to set the thumbnail of your project to any image (including gifs).

name: Better emojis
description: Replaces the cat emojis in Scratch comments with improved vector designs.

name: Profile page banner
description: Makes the featured project on any user's profile page into a nice-looking banner.

name: Better forum quoter
description: Select text in a forum post and click quote in the bottom right corner to only quote the select text.

name: Bitmap images copying
description: Allows you to actually copy a bitmap image from the paint editor, so that you can paste it in other websites or software.

name: Block switching
description: Right click on a block to switch it to a related block.

name: Cat blocks
description: Brings back editor cat hat blocks from April Fools 2020.

name: Clone counter
description: Adds a counter in the editor which shows the total amount of clones.

name: Cloud games
description: Available when clicking the Scratch Addons icon. Shows you how many Scratchers are currently on multiplayer projects, and their usernames.

name: Hex color picker
description: Adds hex code inputs to color pickers.

name: Linebreaks in comments
description: Shows the linebreaks (pressing enter) in comments.

name: Confirm actions
description: Asks if you're sure when committing actions under your Scratch account, such as sharing projects.

name: Copy link to comment button
description: Adds a "Copy Link" button to all Scratch comments, next to the "Report" button.

name: Curator link
description: Creates a clickable link for the curator of the front page.

name: Website dark mode
description: Dark theme for the Scratch website, both for 2.0 and 3.0 pages. Multiple options by different authors available.

name: Data category tweaks
description: Provides tweaks for the Data ("Variables") category in the editor.

name: Disable auto-save
description: Disables the automatic saving of projects while editing.

name: Discuss button
description: Adds the discuss button to the navbar.

name: Colored context menus
description: Makes the editor context menus colorful when right-clicking a block.

name: Editor dark mode
description: Dark mode for the Scratch 3.0 project editor. Multiple options by different authors available.

name: Developer tools
description: Adds a find box and new menu options to the editor: copy/paste blocks, better tidy up, go to custom block definition, and more!

name: Messages in editor
description: Displays your message count in the editor.

name: Searchable dropdowns
description: Allows you to search dropdowns in the Scratch editor.

name: Display stage on left side
description: Moves the stage to the left side of the editor.

name: Highlight currently executing blocks
description: Adds a blue border to the blocks that are currently running in a project.

name: Customizable block colors
description: Edit block colors for each category in the editor.

name: Show exact count
description: Shows the exact count for user and studio info. Uses ScratchDB for forums information.

name: Feature unshared projects
description: Allows you to choose unshared projects after clicking "change featured project" in your profile.

name: Fix broken SVG uploads
description: Fixes a bug in the Scratch editor that fails to properly upload SVG files created with some image editors, such as Affinity Designer.

name: Customized quotes & code blocks on forums
description: Shows nicer code and quote blocks on the forums.

name: Forum search
description: Adds a post search to the forum homepage. Uses ScratchDB for information.

name: Forums time zone
description: Converts the post times to the client's time zone.

name: Show full areas
description: Shows the full signature of users on the forums, and shows full What I've been doing on profiles.

name: Auto-hide block palette
description: Hides the block palette if not hovered. Click the lock icon to lock it in place temporarily. Alternatively, use "category click" mode.

name: Forums image uploader
description: Integrates image uploading into the forums.

name: Infinite scrolling
description: Allow for scrolling on different parts of the site without having to click to "load more".

name: Last edit tooltip
description: Hover over a project's share date for information on when it was last edited.

name: Live featured project
description: Shows interactive embed of the featured project, directly from the user's profile page. Based on the implementation on Mega Scratch Userscript.

name: Record project video
description: Adds a "start recording" button to the editor that allows you to record the project's stage.

name: More links
description: Adds links for URLs pointing outside scratch.mit.edu.

name: Mouse position
description: Displays your mouse position next to the flag in the editor.

name: Message count on extension icon
description: Adds the current message count in the Scratch Addons icon.

name: Mute project player
description: Ctrl+Click the green flag to mute/unmute the project.

name: Show my-ocular status
description: Shows ocular statuses and favorite colours. Uses my-ocular.jeffalo.net to obtain status data. Statuses are moderated and filtered.

name: Onion skinning
description: Shows transparent overlays of previous or next costumes when editing a costume. Controlled by buttons under the editor by the zoom buttons.

name: Pause button
description: Adds a pause button next to the green flag.

name: Project progress bar
description: Adds a progress bar for loading and saving projects.

name: Sprite and script count
description: Shows the number of sprites and scripts a project has.

name: Project notes tabs
description: Creates tabs on a project page for the "Instructions" section and the "Notes and Credits" section.

name: Remix tree button on project pages
description: Brings back the remix tree button to project pages.

name: Confirm sprite deletion
description: Asks if you're sure when deleting a sprite inside a project.

name: Resizable comment input
description: Makes the comment input box vertically resizable in Scratch 3.0-styled pages.

name: Scratch Messaging
description: Available when clicking the Scratch Addons icon. Provides easy reading and replying to your Scratch messages: groups messages by project, shows full comment text and context, allows direct comment replying.

name: Scratch Notifier
description: Notifications on new Scratch messages. Click the notification to go straight to the message (comment, project, etc.)

name: Scratch 2.0 → 3.0
description: Makes Scratch 2.0-styled pages look like Scratch 3.0.

name: Search profile
description: Allows you to go to a user's profile when you search their username.

name: Semicolon glitch
description: Adds the semicolon glitch back to Scratch.

name: Show BBCode
description: Adds a button to the forums that shows the BBCode source of a post.

name: Studio manager tools
description: Lets you easily promote or remove anyone from your studios, as well as leaving any studio, through the "curators" tab.

name: True forums YouTube links
description: Replaces links to the embedded site with real YouTube links.

name: YouTube full screen
description: Enables the full screen button in Scratch's YouTube video player.
